attributes.title: Horrible just soooo bad and spams a lot
attributes.review: The app insisted I turned on notifications and when I did not even 5 seconds later I get 22 notifications from it and more kept coming nonstop so I deleted it horrible and do not vote for trump!!!

attributes.title: This creator of the app tried to turn me Homophobic!!!
attributes.review: I was told by downloading this app I would be entered to win a chance to have dinner with Gordon Ramsey. Instead I was put on an email list of spam talking about big orange Cheetos becoming president. What has our world come to??😤

attributes.title: try again.
attributes.review: listen. Gen Z is not to be messed with. go ahead, TRY taking tik tok away from us. it will not end well. you will have a bunch of angry, depressed teenagers who rely on tik tok as their source of happiness, coming at you full force. just don’t do it.

attributes.title: Just not ok
attributes.review: This app is very slow and constantly ask for your location and not only that, there’s really nothing to do on this app. It’s just another way for Donald trump to get followers but really it’s just a boring and bad app.

attributes.title: #savetiktok
attributes.review: This app is trash because it has the word trump in it he is a disgusting human 🤢🤬 he doesn’t even deserve to be president 🙄 he should go to jail and die in there he has done nothing but disrespect all humans except the white people frick all the Karen’s and trump and all the guy Karen’s !!! 🤗

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: I was so excited to download this app, but it is the most disgusting thing I’ve ever seen!! So disappointed. Terrible graphics, looks so bad. terrible content, doesn’t work correctly, just 0/10 do not recommend. Do better please

attributes.title: upset.
attributes.review: I got this app to see what the future plans of America Trump was planning and I was mortified. I do not want to live in a nation like this run by an egotistical president. Americans deserves better. As well as the future of our children. Not to mention he is a racist and a rapist who is a misogynist.

attributes.title: What the actual f.✨💗🧚🏽🙈💐🌚
attributes.review: This app is horrible i don’t understand how people can stand this app. I honestly think it’s should be taken off the app store and banned. Please remove this app from existence! The orange guy doesn’t deserve it. i’m not explaining no more , i’m done😚

attributes.title: Nasty 🤢🤮
attributes.review: When I first got into the app I set it up and the first thing I see is a little sausage 😑 at first I thought that the White House was gonna have a Fourth of July bbq but I realized that it was trumps one inch pp 🤢🤢🤢 it’s was gross and I immediately deleted the app, it’s horrible don’t get it! 🤬😵🤮🤮

attributes.title: YIKES
attributes.review: the second i open this app i got scared and now i’m forever scared because of this app and will possibly never recover so i feel extremely sad and hurt by this app and want nothing more to never look at it again.
